original_text: The Israelites do very wicked things, like the terrible sins that they did at Gibeah. 9: Gibeah is where very bad things happened. See Judges 19-20. God will not forget the wicked things that they have done. He will surely punish them for their sins. The Lord warns his people The Israelites do very wicked things, like the terrible sins that they did at Gibeah. 9: Gibeah is where very bad things happened. See Judges 19-20. God will not forget the wicked things that they have done. He will surely punish them for their sins. The Lord warns his people The Israelites do very wicked things,
korean_text: 그들은 기브아의 시대와 같이 심히 부패한지라 여호와께서 그 악을 기억하시고 그 죄를 벌하시리라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites do very wicked things
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 매우 악한 일을 합니다

sentences.original_text: like the terrible sins that they did at Gibeah
Gibeah is where very bad things happened
sentences.korean_translation: 기뻐는 매우 나쁜 일들이 일어난 곳입니다

sentences.original_text: God will not forget the wicked things that they have done
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들이 행한 악한 일들을 잊지 않으실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will surely punish them for their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들의 죄 때문에 반드시 그들을 벌하실 것입니다
